price: Dájúdájú àwọn tó ṣàì gbàgbọ́ nínú Tírà Ìrántí náà (ìyẹn, al-Ƙur’ān) nígbà tí ó dé bá wọn (ẹni ìparun ni wọ́n.) Dájúdájú òhun mà ni Tírà tó lágbára.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِٱلذِّكۡرِ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَكِتَٰبٌ عَزِيزٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū bil-dhik'ri lammā jāahum wa-innahu lakitābun ʿazīzun
